channel.title: Finished Projects on Sandra Schönberger
channel.description: Recent content in Finished Projects on Sandra Schönberger

item.title: Von Aubergine bis Zucker
item.description: A dictionary about German words with Arabic roots. This group project was developed during the 2nd semester. Every student picked a word and created an illustration and a poetical text for this word. I picked the word “Safran”. Since we were not able to meet in person because of the pandemic, we chose the kitchen lithography for our illustrations.

item.title: FAST-Test
item.description: Conception, Illustration and designing of the app “FAST-Test”, which is meant to help stroke patients and relatives. This project was a group project of a fellow student and me. In order to build a functional and working prototype, we spent a lot of time on the conception, which included personas, user stories and user journeys. We also talked to a neurologist about our app. The design is built very simple to guarantee a fast use without difficulty in case of emergency.

item.title: Das Reis(e)korn
